content: i want to start a new conversation. can you prompt me with only one question so that we can get the ball rolling
If you could switch lives with someone for just one day, who would it be and why?

daniel schmidt, my meditation teacher. everything in my life revolves around developing a sharper relationship with my meditation practice, and i feel that if i was able to transform what is happening in my life into something that allowed me to have a deeper relationship with the concept of self happening through me that would be.... important. it would feel... nice. i would like to experience the world through his awakened perspective of awareness, because mine is limited to the domain where im at

It sounds like you're drawn to Daniel Schmidt's unique approach to meditation and awakening, which emphasizes direct experience over theoretical knowledge. His emphasis on living as a " mirror" for life, rather than an intellectual understanding, resonates with many seekers.

By experiencing the world through his awakened perspective, you might gain a deeper understanding of how your own practice can be more embodied and experiential. This could potentially allow you to tap into new levels of awareness and insight that might not be accessible in your current state.

It's interesting that you mention feeling like your life revolves around your meditation practice. Are there specific areas or themes that you feel are ripe for greater understanding or transformation through this awakened perspective?
